/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery over the urban landscape. Cars and taxis are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the cityscape.
